Detailed Description

Reader of CSV, comma separated values, files.

If needed add settings for separator and alternative field escapings.

Member Function Documentation

int CSVReader::readFile (  const MC2String &  file  ) 
 

Read a csv file.

This removes any old content.

Parameters:
file The path to the file to read.
Returns:
0 if file read ok, -1 if failed to read file, -2 if failed to parse the file content as a csv file.
